channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiSIEM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiSIEM

item.title: CVE-2022-42478|2024-10-23T14:27:01.609Z -- fortinet -- fortisiem
item.description: An Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts [CWE-307] in FortiSIEM below 7.0.0 may allow a non-privileged user with access to several endpoints to brute force attack these endpoints.
